prompts: Create a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a musical instrument with a soothing presence.
Show me a psychic-type Pokemon with flowing ribbons and a serene appearance.
Imagine a ghostly Pokemon that floats gently, embodying calm and tranquility.
Design a Pokemon that has a bell-like shape and is known for its melodic sounds.
Generate an elegant creature with a delicate tail that dances in the breeze.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in peaceful environments and has a soft color palette.
Give me a unique Pokemon that could be found in serene mountain landscapes.
